name: Change your habits
description:
This game is an example of how anyone can change your habits. It is enough to remember about such small things as turning off the light or turning off unused electronic devices to help the planet.

It is a point and click game in which the player's task is to help learn good habits. He must react when the character forgets to turn off the water or turn off the light. After a few reactions, the character learns. When the player fills the gauge in the upper corner, he moves to the next family.

Remember!
,,Be a part of solution, not part of pollution.''

Tips:
- lights can be turn off
- you can click on things that the character used

Made by 2 Ducks Studio
